forward_facing: toward the creatures pulling the vehicle
acceleration: half the speed of the pulling creature(s)
propulsion: muscle (pulled; 6 Medium creatures or 2 Large creatures)
driving_space: the two most forward squares of the chariot
maximum_speed: twice the speed of the pulling creature(s)
name: Chariot, Heavy
driving_check: Handle Animal or Profession (driver) (in the case of creatures with animal intelligence pulling the vehicle), Diplomacy or Intimidate (in the case of intelligent creatures)
